document_data.name: Uramyl Widemeadow
document_data.mainbody: amyl had short white hair and brown eyes.
document_data.Description: Uramyl had short white hair and brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Uramyl joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|forward camp]] outside the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She worked there at a field kitchen, feeding and watering the expedition.
